id: Schedules/Exemptions for Certain Classes of Data Fiduciaries and Purposes copy
title: Schedule V: Terms and Conditions of Service of the Chairperson and Members of the Data Protection Board
description: Schedule V provides detailed rules governing the service conditions of the Chairperson and Members of the Data Protection Board of India. Since these individuals are central to the enforcement of the DPDPA, their independence, integrity, and impartiality must be safeguarded through well-defined service conditions.
